title: Large Digits Watch
summary: Large digital display watch with color of the days.
description: Large Digital Display is for smart watch owner who preferred their smart watch to have large font displaying the hour, minute, date and day.Day are displayed in the lucky colors, according to day of week.Prerequisites:•	Android 4.3 or higher on the handheld device•	Android 5.0 or higher on the wearable device
descriptionHTML:
Large Digital Display is for smart watch owner who preferred their smart watch to have large font displaying the hour, minute, date and day.

Day are displayed in the lucky colors, according to day of week.

Prerequisites:
• Android 4.3 or higher on the handheld device
• Android 5.0 or higher on the wearable device
recentChanges: Watch face unable to start properly on devices that have non-standard screen dpi (dots-per-inch) such as 213dpi, 280dpi, 400dpi, 560dpi, etc.
